religious_sites.name: Qurayyah
religious_sites.description: Rock inscriptions show Egyptian-style motifs from the New Kingdom (c. 1400s BCE).

religious_sites.name: Abydos
religious_sites.description: Major religious site, early kings’ burial place.

religious_sites.name: Philae
religious_sites.description: Last Bastion of Egyptian Religion. The Temple of Isis at Philae was among the last active centers of traditional Egyptian religion, even under Roman rule.
